meaningMnemonic: With the <kanji>height</kanji> of my <kanji>husband</kanji>, he's very <vocabulary>firm</vocabulary>. Try to push him over. Impossible. He's so tall and <vocabulary>sturdy</vocabulary> due to his height.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out for the rendaku.
